sentences.en: And this is why numerous people with lofty ideals are still working determinedly for this cause.
sentences.cn: 这也就是为什么无数仁人志士仍矢志不渝地要为此而努力奋斗的原因.

sentences.en: And today as the appreciation of a Primal Cause becomes the spiritual instinct asserts itself determinedly.
sentences.cn: 今天,幸亏远古成因已日渐清晰化,精神本能已能果断的宣称自己的地位了.

sentences.en: Dorothy's chin set determinedly as she looked calmly at him.
sentences.cn: 多萝西平静地看着他,下巴绷得紧紧的,看来是打定主意了.

sentences.en: He bent to kiss me, but I turned my face determinedly away.
sentences.cn: 他俯身要吻我, 但我断然把脸扭开了.

sentences.en: He clung to the past determinedly.
Schryhart straightened up determinedly and offensively.
sentences.cn: 希哈利坚决地、无礼地挺起了身子.

sentences.en: She stepped determinedly in his way.
Stepped forward determinedly , Mr. Johnson looked at the long road ahead of him.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊先生望着面前漫长的道路毅然挺身而出.

sentences.en: The poems rhyme too determinedly, ungainly as pairs tied together in a three - legged race.
sentences.cn: 这些诗的韵脚硬绑绑的, 象两人各把一条腿绑在一起参加三腿竞走那样笨拙.

sentences.en: They had him surrounded and were determinedly snapping the breakers off.
sentences.cn: 他们围住了他,非要关掉断路器.

sentences.en: They were determinedly snapping the breakers off.

words.tran_cn: 决定因素；[数] 行列式

trans.tran_cn: 坚定地，坚决地，决然地，断然地
